device.info.title: Device informations
device.manage.descr: Here you can manage your device allowed to connect to your Caliopen account, set restrictions on some IP addresses and custom the name of your device to better identify it later.
device.manage.title: Manage Your device
device.manage_form.add-ip.label: Add a line
device.manage_form.ips.infotext: Restrict the access of your account to certain IP addresses for this device. (e.g. 192.168.10 or 192.168.1.1/24 or 192.168.1.1-20)
device.manage_form.ips.label: IP or subnet address
device.manage_form.name.infotext: This is the name which allows you to identify your device everywhere.
device.manage_form.name.label: Name:
device.manage_form.type.infotext: You can select the type of your device: smartphone, tablet, laptop or desktop.
device.manage_form.type.label: Type:
device.revoke.descr: Please be careful about this section! This operation will delete this device which will be unable to access to your Caliopen account in the future.
device.revoke.title: Revoke this device
device.verify.descr: You need to verify this device to allow it to access to your Caliopen account. Please note that this action can have an impact on your Privacy Index according to the device information and settings. You'll find below some informations about the device which tried to connect to your Caliopen account.
device.verify.title: Verify you device
